refnamediv.refpurpose: Sets the current view in MGED by specifying rotation angles (in degrees) about the x, y, and z axes.

refsection.para: Sets the current view in MGED by specifying rotation angles (in degrees) about the x, y, and z axes. The rotations are performed about the z axis first, then the y axis, then the x axis. The setview 0 0 0 command is a synonym for press top.
The example shows the use of the setview command to set the current view according to specified rotation angles.

info.title: Set the current view in MGED.

example.para: Sets the current view to that set by ae 0 0.
